intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Happy CRM ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our WhatsApp Business Platform integration services.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.name: Name and contact information
personal.phone: Phone numbers (for WhatsApp, SMS, and notification services)
personal.profile: User profile data including username and role

messaging.title: Messaging and Communication Data
messaging.content: Message content across all channels (WhatsApp, SMS, Email, Notes)
messaging.media: Media files including URLs and file types
messaging.metadata: Message metadata (timestamps, delivery status, read receipts)
messaging.webhooks: Webhook data from WhatsApp Business API

system.title: System and Operational Data
system.notifications: Notification preferences and phone number lists
system.activity: User activity logs and session information

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.provide: To provide multi-channel messaging services (WhatsApp, SMS, Email)
usage.messages: To facilitate message sending and receiving through WhatsApp Cloud API
usage.templates: To manage and deliver message templates
usage.notifications: To send notifications based on your preferences
usage.support: To provide customer support and respond to inquiries
usage.improve: To improve our services and develop new features
usage.comply: To comply with legal obligations and Meta's policies
usage.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and optimize performance
usage.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
usage.roles: To manage user roles and permissions within the system

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

meta.title: With Meta/WhatsApp:
meta.content: We share necessary information with Meta to enable WhatsApp Business Platform functionality in accordance with their policies.

providers.title: Service Providers:
providers.content: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform (e.g., cloud hosting, analytics).

legal.title: Legal Requirements:
legal.content: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests.

consent.title: With Your Consent:
consent.content: We may share information with your explicit consent or at your direction.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure API connections, access controls, and regular security audits. All WhatsApp communications are processed through Meta's secure Cloud API infrastructure.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.intro: We provide flexible notification options to keep you informed:
notifications.types: Notification types: deadline reminders, status changes, system updates
notifications.channels: Multiple notification channels: WhatsApp, SMS, Email
notifications.preferences: Customizable preferences for each notification type
notifications.numbers: Ability to add multiple phone numbers for notifications
notifications.control: Full control to enable/disable notifications at any time

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
retention.messages: Message data: Retained according to WhatsApp Business Platform policies
retention.sessions: Session data: WhatsApp 24-hour conversation windows are tracked and archived
retention.user: User data: Retained while account is active and as required by law
retention.backups: Backups: Automated backups retained for disaster recovery purposes
retention.deletion: Deletion: Data deletion requests processed within 30 days

roles.title: User Roles and Access Control
roles.intro: Our platform uses role-based access control to protect your data:
roles.superuser: Superuser: System administrators with full platform access
roles.admin: Admin: Agency administrators who manage users and settings
roles.user: User: Standard users with access to assigned leads and messages
roles.agency: Agency Structure: Multi-tenant architecture ensuring data isolation between agencies
roles.rls: Row Level Security: Database-level security ensuring users only access their authorized data

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.delete: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.restrict: Restrict or object to certain processing activities
rights.notifications: Manage your notification preferences and phone numbers

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business Platform Compliance
whatsapp.content: Our use of the WhatsApp Business Platform is subject to Meta's terms and policies. We comply with:

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws different from your country. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child, we will take steps to delete such information.

updates.title: Updates to This Privacy Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

database.title: Data Collection Details
database.intro: Happy CRM system stores your information in the following specific database tables:

messages.title: Messages Table
messages.content: All messaging data (WhatsApp, SMS, Email, Notes), message content, media URLs, status information, timestamps

whatsapp_sessions.title: WhatsApp Sessions Table
whatsapp_sessions.content: 24-hour session management, phone numbers, session start/end times, template initiation information

user_profiles.title: User Profiles Table
user_profiles.content: User profile information, role assignments (superuser, admin, user), usernames, creation dates

agencies.title: Agencies Table
agencies.content: Agency information, contact person names, phone numbers, activity status

locations.title: Locations Table
locations.content: Location information, address details, geographic coordinates

routes.title: Routes Table
routes.content: Business route information, route details, location connections

notification_preferences.title: Notification Preferences Table
notification_preferences.content: Notification preferences, channel settings, muted leads list, notification methods

metaReview.title: Meta App Review Compliance
metaReview.intro: Our WhatsApp Business API usage fully complies with Meta's app review requirements:

purpose.title: Usage Purpose
purpose.content: WhatsApp Business API is used exclusively for business customer communication purposes

templates.title: Template Message Management
templates.content: All template messages are approved by Meta and regularly updated

optin.title: User Consent (Opt-in)
optin.content: All users have provided explicit consent for WhatsApp messaging and have opt-out options available

compliance.title: Meta Policy Compliance
compliance.content: Full compliance with WhatsApp Business Policy, Commerce Policy, and Data Processing Terms

spamPrevention.title: Spam Prevention Policies
spamPrevention.intro: The following measures are taken to prevent spam and protect user experience:
spamPrevention.optout: Users' right to stop receiving messages at any time
spamPrevention.relevant: Sending only business-related and valuable content for users
spamPrevention.monitoring: Automatic spam detection and blocking systems
spamPrevention.reporting: User complaint reporting and quick resolution mechanisms

dataRetentionSpecific.title: Specific Data Retention Periods
dataRetentionSpecific.intro: Special retention periods for different data types:
dataRetentionSpecific.messages: Message data: 3 years or user deletion request
dataRetentionSpecific.sessions: Session data: 1 year, inactive sessions 6 months
dataRetentionSpecific.userProfiles: User profiles: While account is active + 2 years

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
terms.description: Before using WhatsApp Business integration, you must read and accept the following terms.

happyCrmTerms.serviceUsage: Service Usage: You can benefit from customer relationship management and WhatsApp messaging services by using the Happy CRM platform.
happyCrmTerms.dataSecurity: Data Security: All customer data is stored encrypted and not shared with third parties.
happyCrmTerms.usageResponsibilities: Usage Responsibilities: The user is responsible for the content of messages sent through the platform.
happyCrmTerms.serviceInterruptions: Service Interruptions: Temporary service interruptions may occur during maintenance and update work.
happyCrmTerms.checkbox: I have read and accept the Happy CRM Terms of Service

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.dataCollection: Data Collection: Usage statistics and message metadata are collected to improve service quality.
privacyPolicy.dataStorage: Data Storage: Personal data is stored only during the service period and necessary security measures are taken.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartySharing: Third Party Sharing: Your data is not shared with third parties except for legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.dataRights: Data Rights: You have the right to access, correct and delete your data.

whatsappTerms.whatsappPolicies: WhatsApp Policies: WhatsApp Business API usage is subject to Meta's commercial policies.
whatsappTerms.messageLimits: Message Limits: Daily message limits set by WhatsApp apply.
whatsappTerms.contentRules: Content Rules: Sending spam, misleading or harmful content is prohibited.
whatsappTerms.accountSuspension: Account Suspension: Your WhatsApp account may be suspended in case of violation of rules.

importantNotice.title: ⚠️ Important Notice
importantNotice.content: After WhatsApp Business integration is activated, all communications with your customers will be subject to WhatsApp's commercial messaging policies. Sending messages without customer consent may result in your account being suspended.
